results.title: Mount Washington set a record for coldest wind chill ever recorded at minus 108 degrees.

results.title: Ozempic Can Cause Major Weight Loss. What Happens if You Stop Taking It?

results.title: Bodies of 3 Men Are Found After They Disappeared in Detroit
results.abstract: They were discovered at an abandoned building 12 days after the men were supposed to meet at a rap show. The police called their deaths homicides but said the cause and motive were still unknown.

media.caption: The bodies were discovered on Thursday in an abandoned apartment building in Highland Park, Mich.

results.title: Attacks on Electrical Substations Raise Alarm

results.title: Democrats Overhaul Party’s Primary Calendar, Upending a Political Tradition
results.abstract: The proposal radically reshapes the way the party picks its presidential nominees, putting more racially diverse states at the front of the line.

results.title: Women Have Been Misled About Menopause
results.abstract: Hot flashes, sleeplessness, pain during sex: For some of menopause’s worst symptoms, there’s an established treatment. Why aren’t more women offered it?

results.title: Muscle Cars, Balaclavas and Fists: How the Scorpions Rolled Through Memphis
results.abstract: Residents say the street crime unit was an intimidating and sometimes violent presence in the city. Five Scorpion officers are charged with murdering Tyre Nichols during an arrest.

media.caption: On Jan. 7, officers pulled Tyre Nichols from his car and kicked and beat the 29-year-old amateur photographer as he begged them to let him go home. He later died at the hospital.

results.title: Eye Drops Are Recalled After Being Linked to Vision Loss and 1 Death
results.abstract: The maker of EzriCare Artificial Tears said it was recalling the eye drops after U.S. health authorities linked the product to a drug-resistant bacteria strain.
